resources.string: OOPS! This app is not available yet.
You are not connected!\nEnable a valid connection and retry.
Please login before proceeding with the application.
Application initialization failed. Try connecting again.
A new version is available. Would you like to update the application now?
A new version of ViaggiaRovereto is available.
Authenticate yourself with your Google account. This step is optional but enables ViaggiaRovereto advanced functionalities.

string.name: about_text_app
string.b: Integrated mobility information for the city of Rovereto

resources.string:
The application is developed by the SmartCampus project\n\n
www.smartcampuslab.it

In collaboration with the municipality of Rovereto\n\n
www.comune.rovereto.tn.it
